thumb.title: Purification / 初音ミク
thumb.description: PurificationGrey skies, a stagnant heart,灰色の空 澱んだ心Beyond the heavily closed door,重く閉ざした扉の向こうI feel like I'm being crushed by the suffocation,息苦しさに 押しつぶされそうI wander around like a lost child, Days spent on the road,迷子の様に 彷徨う日々Fallen leaves dance, A quiet road,枯れ葉の舞う 静かな道A cold wind caresses my cheeks,冷たい風が 頬を撫でるShadows of the past flicker, But let's move forward,過去の影が ちらつくけれどone step at a time,一歩ずつ 前に進もうCleansing, A clear light shines,浄化 澄み渡る光射すWarm rain cleanses the heart,心洗う 温かい雨Washing away the tainted heart,汚れた心を 洗い流してSo that new buds may sprout,新しい芽が 芽吹くようにCleansing, The road leading to the future,浄化 未来へと続く道A light of hope lights up in my heart,希望の光 胸に灯してMy doubts disappear, I become stronger,迷いは消え 強くなれるI walk this road that leads to tomorrow明日へ繋がる この道を歩くMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataIllust : だねくさ
thumb.last_res_body: 88888888888888888... Good!! So sentimental! SopSo 88888888 うぽつです🚄 88888888888 好きなサウンド✨ キレイ✨ うぽつです🍀 88888888🦁 うぽつです🦁
